item.title: Submit an Application
item.description: Confirm Eligibility Check the boxes below to confirm your eligibility before submitting an application to us so that we can file for an exemption on your behalf. If the answer to any of the following questions is “no,” we cannot file a STAR exemption on your behalf. This is because you are ineligible to receive a STAR benefit if: You are already receiving one for another property You are filing for a second STAR exemption In order to proceed, I agree to the following by checking the boxes below: First Name Continue

item.title: Make an Appointment
item.description: Sign up to arrange an appointment with one of the Tax Correction Group representatitves First Name Last Name Address Email Address Phone Number Appointment Date and Time Submit

item.title: About
item.description: Goals: The goal of the Tax Correction Group, LLC. is to ensure that homeowners receive their fair share of tax savings The Tax Correction Group, LLC. is a limited-liability corporation based out of Huntington, New York. Our organization was founded based on the idea that every person deserves the tax exemptions for which they are eligible, and that nobody should lose money because of the complicated filing process. As such, we strive to make filing as easy as possible.

item.title: Contact
item.description: We are here to help you Contact us at:    stamatatos@taxcorrectiongroup.com    +1 (631) 827–8901 Please feel free to contact us with any questions, comments, or concerns.
